The proposed development, which would be built on around 20,000 sq metres of land at Meet… [+2634 chars]

articles.author: James Walker, Louise Baxter
articles.title: Martin Lewis scam: Scams 'stealing money and personal data from thousands of people' - Express
articles.description: Scams featuring the famous Money Saving Expert, Martin Lewis, are one of many targeting the British public this holiday season.
